attributes.action: scrap early release of any prisoners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if a person has been found guilty of a crime why should they be given early release? they have been given a sentence for a reason!

rejection.details: This petitin overlaps with severla already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Prison/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
